Managing Partner

Jim Lindsey is a Managing Partner of Arden 55+ Living. He is responsible for sourcing new investments and takes an active role in property operations.

Prior experience includes TA Associates Realty, JRK Property Holdings and CB Richard Ellis. He received a B.S. in accounting from the University of Southern California and an MBA with a concentration in real estate from the University of Wisconsin.
